reviews.review: Genial.

Даже не знаю что написать... Потому что про эту игру уже [i]все[/i] сказано. 
Да, [b]она действительно удалась[/b],
Гемплэй, озвучка: все это требует отдельных похвал.
Головоломки, которые хочется решать
Уровни, которые интересно проходить...
В некоторых местах действительно нужно пошевелить мозгами, прежде чем что-то получится.
Хоть наиграл еще очень мало, какой-никакой отзыв могу оставить
Так что для меня 10/10 в этом жанре.
Советую к покупке!

P.S. В будущем дополню.
Un jeu toujours excellent depuis sa date de sortie
Love this game.

This is the pinnacle of game design.  Clever, focused, innovative, funny, accessible and rewarding to new gamers and experienced campaigners alike.  Any list of the best games ever made would have to feature Portal near the top.  I've yet to meet anyone who's played this game and is less than wildly enthusiastic about its quality.  Buy it now.

It's Portal.


Buy it already.


(BTW, the cake is a lie. Just a head's up.)
好玩，突破了我对解谜游戏的认识。很考验空间感。治好了我多年的3D眩晕（
Probably one of the games that I have replayed more than any other.
A classic game that will never get old and makes you feel smart while having fun.
this game is one of the best games ever made
Gra przełomowa, zupełnie nowe podejście.
I cry....... everytime..... I just......cry!
Super gra logiczna polecam wyszstkie jeje atuty polecam ewa wachowicz

Sinceramente, de los mejores juegos que he jugado...pero, está sobrevalorado no? Es decir, sí, el juego tiene fallos mínimos, pero tan increible que dice todo el mundo que es el juego para solo haberle tenido que echar 3 horas. El juego es genial y lo recomiendo, pero juegalo queriendo jugar a un buen juego, no a una de las mayores joyas existentes como algunos dicen. Ahora a por el segundo
Gran juego de puzzles, con un diseño fenomenal, un desarrollo evolutivo y dificultad geniales, ademas GLaDOS es genial con su evolucion en el segundo, sin olvidar el pastel
toll
非常有创意的游戏，根本停不下来，不过打这个游戏会有点晕，特别是重力有变换的的地方。
超级好玩，可以提高解密水平，赞~~~~~~~~~~
*Inhales* Just... *pause* It's... *another pause* Just play the damn thing.

Short, fun, clever, brilliant.

It only takes about 4 hours to play through, but somehow manages to pack more into those 4 hours than a game ten times its length. This is a must buy.

This game is so good.
Different, dynamic and even funny.
One of my top 5 favourite games
an oldy but still fun playtrough , thumbsup
its like half an hour long but :)))))
Great and funny story, amazing gameplay and puzzles. A short but great game.
하프라이프 와의 연관성으로 대작의 반열에 오른 게임
Great game! Just try it - i has a very good story and the lavels are fun to solve.
This game made me rethink the concept of cake
I firmly believe that GLaDOS needs that hug.

it's such a shame that this game is shadowed by the sequel of portal 2.
this game is atmospheric. i felt desolated and scared at points while experiencing this game.
though, if you want me to tell you one thing, i'll just say this;
actually, i will not say anything else. it is for you to find out.
Holds up surprisingly well.
Ставь лукас, если пишешь обзор ради значка ;D

Portal gehört zu diesen Spielen die man gespielt haben muss. 
Preis is jetz erstmal Nebensache. Der Spassfaktor steht bei Portal ganz oben. Jeder der dieses Spiel kennt wird sich irgendwann mal gedacht haben, wie geil wäre das wenn ich diese Fähigkeiten aus dem Spiel im echten Leben haben könnte. Die Ego Perspektive dazu macht das Spielgefühl noch so viel besser, weil man sich richtig im Spiel drin fühlt. Vorsicht bei manchen Sachen könnte einem schwindelig werden.
Cos Glad0s really needs a damn good hug.
Otra obra maestra de los chicos de Valve. Esta vez con pistolas de portales. Simplemente juegalo, que tanto en cuanto a historia y jugabilidad, te va a sorprender.
UN JUEGAZO. Recomiendo  a todo el mundo que cuando alla rebajas se lo compre corriendo.
IT FUCKS WITH YOUR HEAD

I really think this game could go far beyond even Portal 2. The idea of this "gravity" of game type is amazing I love it!

10.5/10
Sigue siendo completamente una obra maestra.
probably the best puzzle/ story I've played
A short but incredible puzzle based game. The storyline is minimal compared to the sequel, but what there is, complements the excellent gameplay.
This game was a triumph
The villian in most need of a hug!

Definitely worthwhile, especially with the sequel, but Portal works great as a standalone as well. My total playtime is somewhat skewed due to a slight glitch with Steam that didn't record the full time, but I've spent several hours admiring the ability of the creators to build challenging yet fun puzzles that include so many different variables. 9/10, would buy again
Gran juego, maravilla. Tiene toda la esencia Valve que hace que el juego sea extraordinario. Nada más que añadir. No sé por qué sigues sin comprártelo.
Jogo bom e envolvente, onde você faz o possível para ficar o máximo de tempo jogando ele. Se destaca pois o personagem mais envolvente é a vilã, que nem se quer precisa ser vista para ser marcante.
Super Story mit sehr viel witz, die einen beim rätseln bei laune halten

For most game developers today this is should be the perfect example of a game done well. 
It has a very nice story, it's intuitive, it's fun and thanks to the test chambers it has a good replayability level. Also, it's a game for all ages. 
I highly recommend this game to everyone.
Best game ever!!!

O que posso dizer sobre esse jogo? Com certeza é um jogo essencial para quem goste de um bom jogo de puzzle e uma ótima história. Foi uma inovação quando lançado e, até hoje, considero como sendo um dos melhores jogos já lançados pela Valve (muitos podem concordar). Portal apresenta desafios que te deixarão intrigados, mas não irá lhe frustrar a ponto de desistir do jogo. Ele conta uma história que deixa alguns mistérios mas ainda sim consegue lhe envolver com seus personagens ricos e muito bem desenvolvidos. Recomendo fortemente para todos, assim como recomendo o próximo da sequência, Portal 2.
퍼즐 게임 좋아한다면 추천!!!안 좋아해도 한번 해보는 걸 추천!!
Dit is (samen met zijn sequel) het beste puzzel spel ooit. Het is heerlijk om even een avondje stil te zitten, en gewoon een beetje puzzels oplossen. Zeker een aanrader!
boring

Was a toss up for me wether to nominate this for either "Test of Time" Award or "WHOOOAAAAAAAAH, DUDE!" Award.  It did blow my mind when it first came out, however this is one of the few games that I will come back to, reinstall, and play through again just because its awesome.
too much toxic gas 9/10
Tanto años y me sigue pareciendo el mejor juego que he jugado hasta el momento junto con su secuela...
Love this game
its a good.
Перша і топова мозговивриваюча гра! 10 з 10!
Отличная головоломка! Юмор и атмосфера присутствуют.
Gioco molto carino, i puzzle sono divertenti ed è abbastanza inquietante e misterioso da tenerti incollato allo schermo tutto il tempo. Finito in un pomeriggio.

El mejor juego que he jugado
Simplemente puedo decir una frase:
"The cake is a lie"
Jogo com uma imersão sensacional. História que te prente o tempo todo, personagens que te cativam, te emocionam e te fazem ficar com raiva. Puzzles desafiadores e bem construídos. Enfim, lindo <3

With this purchase you get, a free tour through Aperture Sciences Headquarters with some practical experiments to help consolidate your understanding of the scientific method.
They even have an ever-helpful robot whose sole task it is to guide you through these experiments safely.
Definitely recommended for the scientifically minded.
Fantastic writing, level design, art design, concept, music, mechanics and voice acting. This the best game in history for a reason and there's no excuse for not playing it.
Master Piece 10/10. A little bit short, but totaly necesary.
經典，我的第一款steam遊戲
Хорошая игра совету всем у кого нет девушки и кто любит каэсочку!
A classic, lovely game; a must have tbh
생각보다 플레이시간이 짧긴한데 그래도 창의력이 돋보는 좋은 겜!
Me lo sugirieron mis compis de clase y la verdad es que esta muy chulo el juego. No es un juego tipico, ya que tendras que pensar mientras te diviertes y te sumerges en la historia.

A timeless game that does not fail to entertain me every time.

10/10 would test again.

Von mir geehrt mit der "Ich brache alle Achievements!!!1!11!" Auszeichnung - Steam Awards 2016 (eigene Kategorie)

Ich denke, dass ich nicht nochmal erwähnung muss, dass dieses Spiel die Mutter aller Puzzelspiele und ein must-buy für jeden Steam Nutzer ist. 
Außerdem ist es das Spiel mit den am kreativsten versteckten Radios.
gg
Awesome!!
i can't believe i ate the whole thing
This is probably the only game that I want everyone to have played... at least once.

I've owned this game for a looong time now and I still find it appealing and fun. I generally like puzzel games and portal handels it like no other, that is better than every other puzzel games I've played so far. Highly recommend it. :)

Me ha encantado este juego, aunque corto, es un juego divertido y entretenido. Si no lo has jugado... ¿que haces? 

Pd. Es la mejor tarta que he probado en mi vida ;)
When you want cake but the cake doesn't want you.
It's amazing!

Almost 10 years later and I still play this. 

P.S. - If you are reading this, just buy the game already. Seriously, it's good.

Played Portal 2 and wanted to try Portal 1, so I bought the Portal bundle
In my opinion Portal 1 is harder than Portal 2 as there are quite a number of puzzle requiring timing
Still, it is a great game

p.s.If possible try to play Portal 1 before playing Portal 2. Yes the story of Portal 2 can be easily understood even without playing Portal 1 but it feels different playing 2 after completing 1, as some of the levels are repeated

Прошло почти что десять лет, а мои эмоции, во время тридцать восьмого повторного перепрохождения, ничуть не изменились. Это действительно нестареющая классика. Едва ли есть еще такая игра, с которой связано столько теплых воспоминаний, и которая действительно способна вызывать искренний смех на протяжении стольких лет.

Waaas, ich hab nie Portal bewertet? Na dann aber schnell.

Kurz und bündig: Wer es noch nicht hat, der soll es sich holen, aber schnell!!! 

"Ein Leben ohne Portal ist möglich, aber sinnlos." (Gott, Schöpfer von allem und natürlich auch von Portal)

Grandioso, Clássico que nunca perde seu brilho gráficos leves e descomplicado
Além de possuir ótimos bolos. KKKKKKKKKKKKKK

I´ve suggested an award to this game: Best in-game tool (that it is not a weapon) 
Portal is great. Amazing concept, history and one of the best villains in video gaming history. Not to mention the "portal gun", obviously.
Play it!
10/10
Великолепная головоломка с трогательным сюжетом, очень понравилась, советую всем.

Одна из немногих игр, которые можно будет рекомендовать к покупке своим друзьям и знакомым еще долгие годы.
И даже для тех кто уже ее прошел, и не раз, всегда найдется что ни будь новенькое в мастерской стима. Ведь как бы далеко позади ни была дата релиза, комьюнити ее помнит.

The first time you play Portal is just a refreshing experience of great puzzle solving and a hilariously dark narrative. Each subdsequent time then poses as a new challenge for oneself to better their completion time. For a linear puzzle game, practicing and mastering the techniques to finish the game quicker each time is a part of the fun.

Ein zeitloser Klassiker der in keiner Spielesammlung fehlen sollte.


Warnung: kann zu Übelkeit führen durch zu schelles bewegen durch den Raum
Шедевр, 10 из 10. Покупать всем, играть каждому.
Impresionante
Someone said cake?!
A classic everyone should play at least once
JUEGAZO!
still one of the best puzzle games around, portal 2 might beat it but only by an inch do to gfx improvment
One of the greatest puzzle games I've found... makes you laugh, and think, and laugh again. I still go back and play it once in a while.
My favorite game of all time.
